name: Outer Shoals
role_in_state: hazardous pilotage zone and reagent/salt supplier
culture_adjustments: strong local salvage rites and votive offerings at wreck-sites
pilot-gangs outrank merchant guild reps in local authority
apprenticeship favors hands-on seamanship over formal guild halls
constraints: ritual magic reliant on imported reagents (scarce)
notes: pilot guilds maintain lightships and charge passage fees
economy fragile to tariff shifts and reagent shortages
local timekeeping synchronized to tide-watch rather than solar calendars
